Package Classes.Listing.Item

Class ItemAttribute

java.lang.Object
Classes.Listing.Item.ItemAttribute
public class ItemAttribute
extends java.lang.Object
Represents an Attribute of an Item. Can be a "general attribute," such as color or material, or an attribute unique to a given subcategory.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    java.lang.Long attributeRecommendationId
    The ID of the value that the user selected for the attribute.
    java.lang.Long itemAttributeId
    ID of the ItemAttribute.
    java.lang.String itemAttributeValue
    The CUSTOM value of the attribute.
    java.lang.Long subcategoryAttributeId
    ID of the SubcategoryAttribute that this value applies to.

  • Field Details

    • subcategoryAttributeId

      public java.lang.Long subcategoryAttributeId
      ID of the SubcategoryAttribute that this value applies to.

      NULLABLE because general attributes do not have IDs

      Set By:
      The app when the user supplies a value for the attribute.
      Set When:
      Creating an item in the Android app
      Can Be Modified By:
      The app when the user supplies a new value for the attribute.
      Can Be Modified When:
      Editing an item in the Android app.

    • itemAttributeId

      public java.lang.Long itemAttributeId
      ID of the ItemAttribute. This is the primary key of the attribute in the database. It will have

      NOTE: This will be NULL when creating a new item in the app. It is not set until the item is saved.

      Set By:
      The database (should be autoincremented)
      Set When:
      Saving a new item
      Can Be Modified By:
      No one
      Can Be Modified When:
      Never

    • itemAttributeValue

      public java.lang.String itemAttributeValue
      The CUSTOM value of the attribute. This will only have a value if the user entered a custom value (rather than selecting from a list)

      NOTE: This will likely not be used as no attributes currently have custom values enabled.

      Set By:
      The user when setting a custom value for an attribute
      Set When:
      Saving a new item
      Can Be Modified By:
      The user when modifying a custom value or changing an attribute to have a custom value
      Can Be Modified When:
      Saving an existing item

    • attributeRecommendationId

      public java.lang.Long attributeRecommendationId
      The ID of the value that the user selected for the attribute.
      Set By:
      The user when setting a value for an attribute
      Set When:
      Saving a new item
      Can Be Modified By:
      The user when modifying the value of an attribute
      Can Be Modified When:
      Saving an existing item

  • Constructor Details

    • ItemAttribute

      public ItemAttribute()
